verses.verse: My <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H7911>forget<s%> <S%H408>not<s%> my <S%H8451>law;<s%> but let thine <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H5341>keep<s%> my commandments: <S%H4687><s%>
For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H753>length<s%> of <S%H3117>days,<s%> and <S%H8141>long<s%> <S%H2416>life,<s%> and <S%H7965>peace,<s%> shall they <S%H3254>add<s%> to thee.

Let <S%H408>not<s%> <S%H2617>mercy<s%> and <S%H571>truth<s%> <S%H5800>forsake<s%> thee: <S%H7194>bind<s%> them <S%H5921>about<s%> thy <S%H1621>neck;<s%> <S%H3789>write<s%> them <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H3871>table<s%> of thine heart: <S%H3820><s%>
So shalt thou <S%H4672>find<s%> <S%H2580>favor<s%> and <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H7922>understanding<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> and <S%H120>man.<s%>
Trust <S%H982><s%> <S%H413>in<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> thine <S%H3820>heart;<s%> and <S%H8172>lean<s%> <S%H408>not<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> thine own <S%H998>understanding.<s%>
In <S%H3605>all<s%> thy <S%H1870>ways<s%> <S%H3045>acknowledge<s%> him, and <S%H1931>he<s%> shall <S%H3474>direct<s%> thy <S%H734>paths.<s%>
Be <S%H1961><s%> <S%H408>not<s%> <S%H2450>wise<s%> in thine own <S%H5869>eyes:<s%> <S%H3372>fear<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H5493>depart<s%> from <S%H4480>evil.<s%> <S%H7451><s%>
It shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H7500>health<s%> to thy <S%H8270>navel,<s%> and <S%H8250>marrow<s%> to thy <S%H6106>bones.<s%>

Honor <S%H3513><s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> with thy <S%H4480>substance,<s%> <S%H1952><s%> and with the <S%H4480>firstfruits<s%> <S%H7225><s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> thine increase: <S%H8393><s%>
So shall thy <S%H618>barns<s%> be <S%H4390>filled<s%> with <S%H7647>plenty,<s%> and thy <S%H3342>presses<s%> shall burst <S%H6555>out<s%> with new <S%H8492>wine.<s%>
My <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H3988>despise<s%> <S%H408>not<s%> the <S%H4148>chastening<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> <S%H408>neither<s%> be <S%H6973>weary<s%> of his correction: <S%H8433><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H157>loveth<s%> he <S%H3198>correcteth;<s%> even as a <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> in whom he <S%H7521>delighteth.<s%>
Happy <S%H835><s%> is the <S%H120>man<s%> that <S%H4672>findeth<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom,<s%> and the <S%H120>man<s%> that <S%H6329>getteth<s%> <S%H8394>understanding.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> the <S%H5504>merchandise<s%> of it is <S%H2896>better<s%> than the <S%H4480>merchandise<s%> <S%H5505><s%> of <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and the <S%H8393>gain<s%> thereof than fine <S%H4480>gold.<s%> <S%H2742><s%>

She <S%H1931><s%> is more <S%H3368>precious<s%> than <S%H4480>rubies:<s%> <S%H6443><s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the things thou canst <S%H2656>desire<s%> are <S%H3808>not<s%> to be <S%H7737>compared<s%> unto her.
Length <S%H753><s%> of <S%H3117>days<s%> is in her right <S%H3225>hand;<s%> and in her left <S%H8040>hand<s%> <S%H6239>riches<s%> and <S%H3519>honor.<s%>
Her <S%H1870>ways<s%> are <S%H1870>ways<s%> of <S%H5278>pleasantness,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> her <S%H5410>paths<s%> are <S%H7965>peace.<s%>
She <S%H1931><s%> is a <S%H6086>tree<s%> of <S%H2416>life<s%> to them that lay <S%H2388>hold<s%> upon her: and <S%H833>happy<s%> is every one that <S%H8551>retaineth<s%> her.
The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> by <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> hath <S%H3245>founded<s%> the <S%H776>earth;<s%> by <S%H8394>understanding<s%> hath he <S%H3559>established<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens.<s%>
By his <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> the <S%H8415>depths<s%> are broken <S%H1234>up,<s%> and the <S%H7834>clouds<s%> drop <S%H7491>down<s%> the <S%H2919>dew.<s%>
My <S%H1121>son,<s%> let <S%H408>not<s%> them <S%H3868>depart<s%> from thine <S%H4480>eyes:<s%> <S%H5869><s%> <S%H5341>keep<s%> sound <S%H8454>wisdom<s%> and discretion: <S%H4209><s%>
So shall they <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H2416>life<s%> unto thy <S%H5315>soul,<s%> and <S%H2580>grace<s%> to thy <S%H1621>neck.<s%>
Then <S%H227><s%> shalt thou <S%H1980>walk<s%> in thy <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H983>safely,<s%> and thy <S%H7272>foot<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5062>stumble.<s%>
When <S%H518><s%> thou liest <S%H7901>down,<s%> thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> be <S%H6342>afraid:<s%> yea, thou shalt lie <S%H7901>down,<s%> and thy <S%H8142>sleep<s%> shall be <S%H6149>sweet.<s%>

Be <S%H408>not<s%> <S%H3372>afraid<s%> of <S%H6597>sudden<s%> <S%H4480>fear,<s%> <S%H6343><s%> neither of the <S%H4480>desolation<s%> <S%H7722><s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked,<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> it <S%H935>cometh.<s%>
For <S%H3588><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> thy <S%H3689>confidence,<s%> and shall <S%H8104>keep<s%> thy <S%H7272>foot<s%> from being <S%H4480>taken.<s%> <S%H3921><s%>

Withhold <S%H4513><s%> <S%H408>not<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> from them to whom it is <S%H4480>due,<s%> <S%H1167><s%> when it <S%H1961>is<s%> in the <S%H410>power<s%> of thine <S%H3027>hand<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> it.

Say <S%H559><s%> <S%H408>not<s%> unto thy <S%H7453>neighbor,<s%> <S%H1980>Go,<s%> and come <S%H7725>again,<s%> and <S%H4279>tomorrow<s%> I will <S%H5414>give;<s%> when thou <S%H3426>hast<s%> it <S%H854>by<s%> thee.
Devise <S%H2790><s%> <S%H408>not<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> thy <S%H7453>neighbor,<s%> seeing <S%H1931>he<s%> <S%H3427>dwelleth<s%> <S%H983>securely<s%> <S%H854>by<s%> thee.
Strive <S%H7378><s%> <S%H408>not<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> a <S%H120>man<s%> without <S%H2600>cause,<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> he have <S%H1580>done<s%> thee <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H7451>harm.<s%>
Envy <S%H7065><s%> thou <S%H408>not<s%> the <S%H376>oppressor,<s%> <S%H2555><s%> and <S%H977>choose<s%> <S%H408>none<s%> <S%H3605><s%> of his <S%H1870>ways.<s%>
For <S%H3588><s%> the <S%H3868>froward<s%> is <S%H8441>abomination<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> but his <S%H5475>secret<s%> is <S%H854>with<s%> the <S%H3477>righteous.<s%>
The <S%H3994>curse<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked:<s%> but he <S%H1288>blesseth<s%> the <S%H5116>habitation<s%> of the <S%H6662>just.<s%>
Surely <S%H518><s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> <S%H3887>scorneth<s%> the <S%H3887>scorners:<s%> but he <S%H5414>giveth<s%> <S%H2580>grace<s%> unto the <S%H6035>lowly.<s%>
The <S%H2450>wise<s%> shall <S%H5157>inherit<s%> <S%H3519>glory:<s%> but <S%H7036>shame<s%> shall be the <S%H7311>promotion<s%> of <S%H3684>fools.<s%>
